::KitKat::

She thought about the situation.  She didn't know the bots who were 
so far, helping htem out.  Usually when one helped, they expected the 
favor returned, and with more in return than what was offered.  She 
looked at Phobia,"Tell me, who is this Destrustor?  And why did he 
help us? No Pred would just help and expect nothing in return. Also, 
if Megatron is without followers, who does that leave us with? I 
heard that most of our groups is gone."  She looked down and 
sighed. "I know that I can only trust you and Drillbit right now."
She looked up at Phobia.  "I think it would be best if we takled to 
this Desctuctor. Then we need to get our group together.  I  know I"m 
not the only one who wants to get Megatron for deserting us.  And 
once Megatron is done with, we can then start looking for a base of 
our own.  BUt Megatron has to be delt with. As long as he is around, 
we will never have a moment's rest.  After that," she suddenly had an 
angry look on her face,"After that, I want to pay back those slagging 
maximals." She relaxed, "What do you think Phobia?"





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> "We're currently at the base of a Predacon named Destrucror, 
> Starscreem went ahead to the alliance base, Goldeneye and Dollen 
are 
> considering returning to us and Megatron is currently without 
> followers I suggest we meet the alliance, track him down and take 
> care of our problems one at a time." Phobia knew to leave out the 
> part about Destructors offer so he'd have an ace in the hole if 
this 
> fell through. He didn't fully trust Destructor yet and KitKats 
> trusting ways may get in the way of earning that trust.
>
